verses.roman:
siṁha-dvārera uttara-diśāya āche eka ṭhāñi
tāra madhye paḍi' āchena caitanya-gosāñi

synonyms: siṁha-dvārera—of the gate known as Siṁha-dvāra; uttara-diśāya—on the northern side; āche—there is; eka ṭhāñi—a place; tāra madhye—within that place; paḍi'-lying down; āchena—was; caitanya-gosāñi—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: After searching for some time, they came upon Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu lying in a corner by the northern side of the Siṁha-dvāra gate.
